centerName: HUNTS POINT RECREATION CENTER SUMMER CAMP
permitHolder: NYC DEPARTMENT OF PARKS AND RECREATION

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp fails to provide one lifeguard for 75 campers when off site facility supplies remainder so as to provide 125 supervision ratio
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp operator fails to maintains staff records application qualifications certifications not on file or available for inspection employees education experience training and references not verified
